HDMI sound

Everything you need for AppleHDA investigated Toleda, but not everyone will want to search for his explanation in English. I made patches of DSDT, with his participation, to get as close to his result as possible.

Fundamentally, there are twoanta HDMI devices.

1.       On the external graphics card OF ATI  or NVidia. In the system it is listed as a sound  device of the class HDA 0x0403, and is served by           the same sound  driver. 

2.       Intel's built-in map has  an HDMI connector, but there is no device, the sound from  the chipset HDA    is   used.

 

<key>Devices</key>

<dict>

<key>UseIntelHDMI</key>

<true/>

At the same time, the sound from ATI or NVidia will become "onboard-2."

For DSDT, the necessary fixes: FixDisplay_0100, FixHDA_8000, AddHDMI_8000000

3.       The option is that the intro is only used    for  the I'SV. Then  (iMac18.3) Inthe buildingHDEF has a property  No-hda-gfx

There's nothing in igPU (intro)

In GFX0 (which Radeon) is hda-gfx"onboard-1" and in HDAU it is the same.

Automatically this Clover does not yet, use the array Of Properties.

I note that all these additional productsare only needed for AppleHDA.

 

The start-up sound of the computer

This is the invention of Goldfish64. He wrote an EFI driver for HDA sound, and made utilities to customize the sound, testing and fabrication of the sound codec dump. https://github.com/Goldfish64/AudioPkg

But he inserted the sound at the time of the boot.efi launch, intercepting his call with the loader. I'm interested in making sure it works not just with Clover, but with any EFI loaderwithout touching his internalcodes. 


not lost, and that in the future it can be improved without asking the author, who may disappear, not today, so tomorrow.

So, to work the sound you need:

1.   Use Clover Audit 4871. Worked in past audits, but in bugs.

2.   Put the AudioDxe.efi driver in the EFI/CLOVER/drivers/bios or drivers/UEFI folder accordingly. Or both. This  driver, supplied with Clover,  is already different from  the author's  original, not yet in principle, but I would  recommend exactly its  version.

3.      Put             sound files with sound.wav names and sound_night.wav in the themes you use.wav    sound_night.wav.      16bit little endian unsigned int, sampling frequency  can be   8, 44.1, 48kHz, on this depends on the  sizeof  the file.    But the sound of this  format was able to be packed  directly into Clover, and it is used for testy  output.

4.   Go to Clover's interface, Startup sound output→, and test which  of the  exits  will  play

 

In the first line, adjust the  volume of sound from  0 to 100.   Value 0  means that the    sound will not  be  played. That  is, it is not that shouts with his mouth closed,  and this is that attempts to meow are not made. By the way,  I don't know if the scale is linear or logarithmic.

The following lines are combined from the chip model and its output. If you have a few sonic toart, as is often the case besides the built-in there is still HDMI, then you will all see in this list, with all their outputs.

Clover.SoundVolume, Clover.SoundDevice, Clover.SoundIndex. Here I have a contrast to a goldfish, it keeps the settings in a private area with its UUID, which is impossible for emulating memory, for Legasi-Clover. My settingsand will be visible from the system can be removed or modified from the system, and the Clover prefix ensures there is no conflict with Apple's interests.

On the next reboot you will hear the sound before loading the Clover shell, but after the inscription ... scan entries...

In the confit, these settings are not rendered, no matter what. In any case, you first have to test, which means you already write down the settings in NVRAM.  But there is one setting left over from the test period. PlayAsync=true.

If the phalas, as long as the sound is playing, nothing works. It's like that on the abbot.

If it's a rub, the sound plays in the background without interfering with everything else. I putthe lengths of the sound file and listened to the music.And only after a few loaded cupcakes she shut up, probably it was VoodooHDA, which reinsitizedthe soundchip.

 

NVRAM, iMessage, multiboot

The question of using the NVRAM energy-independent memory system using GetVariable () and SetVariable () features was raisedin 2010  http://www.projectosx.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1504

Then I tried to implement work with him in Chameleon in my own brunch, but Ididn't getanysupport.

In Chameleon, these features are there, but they are made very simply "return Unsupported" so that the system running with Chameleon does not panic, and just did not respond to the call of these functions. It worked for a while, for the removalof the StartupDisk panel.

What does NVRAM mean? If the system wants to keep a variable until the next reboot, it writes it in NVRAM using SetVariable (...). We can alsosave our variables using the nvram utility:

sudo nvram MyVar=qu-qa-re-ku

after the restart, this variable should be known in the system with the help of the reading command

nvram MyVar

How does Clover keep this service healthy?

1. EmuVariableDxe features are used for the boot. This, of course, is not a real   energy-independent  memory,  because    Legasi-Clover  is designed  for  those  computers  where there is no such memory at all,   and there is no EFI of its own with the right

Services. This driver writes variables simply in memory, but this memory is available for use by MacOSX in its native interface. When the system is shut down, the rc.shutdown.local script is called, which keeps all of this memory in the nvram.plist file at the root of thesystem disk. Clover at the start finds this file, and brings all the variables from there again into RAM, emulating NVRAM.

2. For UEFI download we rely on our own Service VariableDxe, which  is provided in OEM UEFI. In the audit 2837 Dmazar corrected the work with this service, so that most users now have  it working in a native way. For those  who do not have        it,   there is an EmuVariableUEFI  emulation driver that works similarly to the legosi    driver,  and  also  requires scripts and file nvram.plist.  The change is represented by the OsxAptioFix3Dxe driver, and vit9696 itself offers a more advanced version of AptioMemoryFix, now includedin Clover's repository.

EmuVariable in both cases is not a full-fledged emulation., for example, panic persists.log, simply because the script does not have time to work. Nor is the variable boot00082 needed for hibernation, but this sroblem is bypassed in other ways.log.

i Message is           Apple'sinstant messaging           system. The mistake was understood only  in January, and thus the chameleons understood what was wrong,  but  they did not have a NVRAM, without  which it was all     impossible.  But also                    recommendations to include appropriate values in the config.plist, for those        who  think a little    more.   You don't need to use someone else's ROM, MLB and UUID, much less  someone else's bank  card. When  all its own, ROM has 12 digits, MLB has 17 cifp, UUID non-zero, and all this is unique,  the account is tied to the current   account,    which  has money, iMessage  will  work. 

Boot D is aservice that lets you choose which system we want to reboot, restart, and just leave.

Using multiple configurations

Possible problem: You have several systems, but these systems should be loaded with a different set of patches spelled out in the confit, such as the definition of Radeon framework in the new system is not the same as in the old one.

That's the config.

<key>GUI</key>

Here's what we've scheduled: We've assigned our own main menu items (Entries)  withthenames  "Capitan  special"  and  "Capitan  default." The second  item,  as  usual, allows you to ship the system with a common config.plist, taking into account the changes made in  Clover's Options menu.

The first  item  creates  a new  icon  for  the  same  system,  but  it will be  loaded  with  another  config-special.plist confit, as indicated in the Settings   key. 


 

But that's not all. By clicking the space we will enter the launch menu, and then find our inputs, spelled out as SubEntries

 

 

 

 


Compare the config with the pictures given to make it clear what's going on.

The second item in this menu means giving up a special confitto use generic.

It is clear that since the special config connects after Clover is launched, the sections of Boot and GUI in it are no longer needed, they can only be in general confit. I, personally, used this opportunity to test new confits to run the captain, having one proven worker.

Now in Clover there is an opportunity to turn theconfigs right on the menu.


The limitation of this method is that the Boot section does not change. Nor does it change KernelAndKextPatches. The new config will take effect after the main menu is available.

Here there is a bewilderment,  and  why even change  toonftig, if not for KextPatches? Alas,  it doesn't            work, the   reason  is somewhere  deep in       Clover's algorithms.    

 

How to make boot.efi not too spamming on the screen?

Enter this menu

and write it down there. Other values may be available, vit9696

log'value,direction of withdrawal

1     — AppleLoggingConOutOrErrSet/AppleLoggingConOutOrErrPrint (classical ConOut or StdErr on  failure)

2     —AppleLoggingStdErrSet/AppleLoggingStdErrPrint (StdErr or serial?)

4 —AppleLoggingFileSet/AppleLoggingFilePrint (BOOTER. LOG/BOOTER. OLD file on EFI partition)

debug=value

1 — enables print something to BOOTER. LOG (stripped code implies there may be a crash) 2 — enables perf logging to /efi/debug-log in the device three

4  — enables timestamp printing for styled printf calls

level-value - error rate

kc-read-size-value - log size

For our purposes, it is enough log-0, which in Clover is done by default.

It's a good place to be. These two drivers are missing from the repository for licensing reasons, you need to find this file somewhere on the network. Now there is a legal analogue GrubNTFS.efi. Available in Clover's installer.

Yes, ideally it should not hang.                Clover would like to      fix                     all this, but alas, the number of bad options is           not       even a   review.   And I strongly  recommend using the latest version of Clover, because such bugs from time to time are found and corrected.

B. The core begins to load, but panics after the tenth line Unable To find a driver for this platform "ACPI".

A. It's missing or wrong DDDT. If you can't get a car, add a manual DDDT. Notice auto patch options, as well as ReuseFFFF keys and DropOEM_DSM.

B. The system starts to load, but stops at still waiting for root device....

A. In addition to the usual for such cases of advice to include AHCI in BIOS, or if not,    to find the right driver (in the sense of a cupcake)  for  your  IDE controller, there is still advice to load with the key  WithKexts (in the new revisions Of NoCaches),  thenthe download will go slower,  and the controller will have time to turn on. By the way,  such an  error  can  occur  only if Clover and the system are on different  devices.

B. The system is loaded  before  the message:  Waiting  for  DSMOS....

A. No FakeSMC. Maybe with Chameleon, you had this cupcake in Extre, and Clover doesn't see that folder. It has a folder /EFI/CLOVER/kexts/10.x or more. Don't forget the InjectKexts key. The default is disabled!

In the second stage andthe installation Clover does not know the version of the system (it is not yet defined), so put FakeSMC in the folder /EFI/CLOVER/kexts/Other/

In the new versions, the InjectKexts key has a "Detect" value, which must automatically handle this situation, check whatis written about your confit.

B. The system passes this message, but nothing changes further, although Winchester buzzes as if the system is loaded.

A. Typical situation where the graphics card is not turned on. Try GraphicInjector'Yes in the confit, or vice versa . . . In the second version of Radeons are launched at the "native factory" that allows you to even work in the system, with a few exceptions, For example, DVDplayer will not work.

B. The system is loaded to the message: "Bluetooth controller....

A. Same. See the previous paragraph. It has nothing to do with the synesub.

 

B. The system is loaded, everything is fine, but the System Profiler errors ...

A. In general, it's cosmetics, the functionality is not affected.

Memory. There are two magnitudes, nominal and actual, and they often don't match. What show in the profile? I put the first one - yelled that it was wrong. Put the second, etee silenced, other users yelled that it is wrong....

See page 47 how to write your memory values in the confit.

 

Conclusion

Clover, of course, is far from perfect, but the process of improving programs is never complete. There will be new revisions, there will be new functions, and for now so.

Clover's biggest flaw is that he's trying to be versatile. The programmer canmake his own version from the source, suitable for his iron.

Despite the presence of automation, instructions, descriptions and a mass of advice from the knowrkov. Chameleon works at the expense of BIOS drivers, and therefore he has a better chance of running on an arbitrary iron, but only no one keeps statistics, in what percentage of cases Clover works better.

Clover's development is over, but the project is not dead, it continues to be, and will continue to develop.

 

 

Chameleon.

Great respect to all the creators of this project, which made possible Mac on the usual P.C. Clover borrowed a lot of technology from him, for it was created for the same purposes (injection graphics cards, efi-stings, patch of aspi, generator sddt, sambios patch, but only all this is already on a completely different level).

I was also among the Chameleon developers and offered their patches/improvements, however, the admins of the project ignored me. There are a lot of flaws and just bugs that have not been fixed. http://www.projectosx.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1106  When Chameleon doesn't work, they don't talk about it, they just ignore it.

The first blow came inthe spring of 2011,  when the 10.7 system came out, and Chameleon was unable to load it. Then  Gyk        discovered that the system could load    the     XRS,    which    is an EFI-loader.      

The second blow occurred in January 2013, when iMessage required ROM and MLB variables in NVRAM to activate. Clover overcame this back in September, but with a small error in the DLline, which was corrected only in January.

The principle of work is quite different. It took Mecklort and Cosmo1 a month to get over that bar. Since that winter, the number of Clover users has exceeded the number of Chameleon users for the first time. "Everything works with the chameleon!"

            The third blow  chameleons ignored, like "no and don't need."

10.7 for some reason. There is no one to investigate why and how it turned out to be. Meklort has retired, the rest of the developers in the team can only make new video card names. Clover was theonly loader with whom hibernation works at least in the 10.9 system.

I can also remind you that the problems of floating regions, the name of the slot, and many not particularly necessary trifles are not solved with Chameleon. In addition, chameleon has a lot of errors that there is simply no one to fix.

The last strike occurred in June 2014. Apple has released the 10.10 Yosemite system that Clover can download, and the necessary patches have already been introduced, starting with Audit 2695. But for Chameleon it seems to have come to an end... Looking back at the history, you realize that the dawncan not be, everything in this world is possible, it is possible that one of the developers will still overcome this bar, and some of the fans will remain with Chameleon.

Happy to stay!

YES: Yes, we have dealt with this problem, Chameleon now loads Josyu, but for some reason there were problems with 10.9.4, problems with NVRAM, and therefore with the IMesage.

Another blow, the adventof the apfs.

Chimera is a stripped-down HaMeleon brunch, with its theme and "other video inject."

That is, for the factory graphics card you need to apply A DDDT patch or cupcake-type natita.

Revobut is a stripped-down Chameleon in which you need to compile your DSDT. That is, everyone should compile a revout for sebya. According to the creators (Master Chief and his "daughter" Revogirl) it allows to reduce the download time while reading the DDDT file. The restof the improvements are even more questionable.

Yes, Chameleon has a right to life because he is a purely legosy  loader,  and  can  work  where  Clover has a problem with legasi-but, old  computers,  left  chipset,  and  the  like.   Some  people  work,  and others don't even try, they just useready-made solutions with Chameleon.        

Anyway, I'm tired of talking about Chameleon. I've been proving for years that Clover's better, someone's never convinced, I don't care. The subject is closed.

 

Other EFI loaders.

 

TheXRS download was announced in 2009, the team gathered and even created a project site.

The project was frozen, the team ran away.

The star hour of the project came when in the spring of  2011  Gyk  installed 10.7 with the help of CRS,  which was impossible with Chameleon, as I said above. Tom came to                   life,  but did not cooperate,  but only allowed the testers to report to the IRS their reports and  wishes. Some  of them tried CRS, and became  his  ardent adherents: "What to do shit, you would better  help  Tom  with  his loader. He's a perfectly adequate guy, and listens to the criticism."           And I, while alone, began to make a loader based on THE DU,and in the first month got  some  results  better than CRS. War so war, I did not give my  know-how to  Tom. And a small initial advantage is the support of Russian users,  which are more than any other.

In Clover version 1, an interface from Ninzi was used that  "stolen"  it from an early version of CRS. In  this  situation, It was impossible to develop Clover, and in early 2012,    when I realized all the necessary  technologies, I started making Clover's interface version 2 based on the rEFIt project, with open  source. I want to  note that the CRS  comes  from him, so the claim is more to him,  which  Tom has the right to  close the sources if  he uses the open. Now  Clover has become licensed clean,   and has risen to the levelofme  when you could talk about competition.   "XPC has so far outd determined no one infunctionality." However,  he still had  an unresolved problem with the system-type,  which in the case of the laptop  interfered  with sleep. As well as board-id,  which  interfered on  some  configurations with the installation of the system 10.7. 


There was no problem,  because I initially chose other patches, according to other ideas, and that of them so influenced was completely unobvious,  looking into  my  sources. I knew, but I decided not to explain it to     anyone. Works in Clover,  so  you'll  use Clover.

This is how the bareBoot project was born.
